description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Board' which renders a 4x4 grid for a 2048 game, including the background grid, tiles, and overlay banners for game over or win states.

methods.name: Board({ board, lastSpawn, gameOver, gameWon, maxTile }, ref)
methods.description: React functional component that renders the game board with tiles and overlays.
